snippet: Somali and Kenyan troops rescued four foreign aid workers held hostage inside Somalia, three days after they were seized from a refugee camp in Kenya, the armies said Monday.
abstract: Somali and Kenyan troops rescue four foreign aid workers held hostage inside Somalia three days after they were seized from a refugee camp in Kenya.
lead_paragraph: Somali and Kenyan troops rescued four foreign aid workers held hostage inside Somalia, three days after they were seized from a refugee camp in Kenya, the armies said Monday.

headline.main: Somalia: Soldiers Rescue Kidnapped Aid Workers
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Soldiers Rescue Kidnapped Aid Workers
